articles.description: Rajasthan Royals (RR) captain Sanju Samson has opined that leg-spinner Yuzvendra Chahal is enjoying his time with the franchise since joining the team.

articles.author: ICC
articles.title: South Africa impress to close in on automatic World Cup berth - ICC Cricket
articles.description: South Africa have given themselves every chance of qualifying automatically for this year's ICC Men's Cricket World Cup with a commanding 146-run victory over the Netherlands in Johannesburg on Sunday.

articles.title: Dominant Bezzecchi gives VR46 first MotoGP win, Bagnaia falls - The Race
articles.description: Valentino Rossi's VR46 team won its first MotoGP race via a commanding performance from Marco Bezzecchi in the wet Argentine Grand Prix
articles.content:
Valentino Rossi’s MotoGP team got its first-ever premier-class win in a wet Argentina Grand Prix, Marco Bezzecchi the rider to secure the milestone.
But the day was soured for Rossi’s VR46 organisat… [+4046 chars]
